name: Frankenstein: Through the Eyes of the Monster
name_original: Frankenstein: Through the Eyes of the Monster
description:
Frankenstein: Through the Eyes of the Monster is an adventure game developed by Amazing Media. It was originally released in 1995. It was published by Interplay Productions. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Frankenstein: Through the Eyes of the Monster is available on PC.
